title: Bangladesh
summary: Citi has a strong presence in Bangladesh since its inception in 1987. We offer support to global multinational companies, local corporates, financial customers and public sector clients with cash management, trade services, agency and trust, and direct custody and clearing solutions.
tag-2: Please be aware of scammers posing as Citi, offering investments via phone or email, or impersonating Citi employees. You can learn more about protecting yourself from scams.
tag-3: Citi Bangladesh provides award winning services and solutions to the Institutional Clients Group (ICG).
tag-4: Citi has a strong presence in Bangladesh since its inception in 1987. We offer support to global multinational companies, local corporates, financial customers and public sector clients with cash management, trade services, agency and trust, and direct custody and clearing solutions.
